title: Rahu Transit in the 10th House for Aries Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting your 10th house intensifies ambition, public image, and career visibility. This phase pushes you toward unconventional paths to authority, recognition, and influence. Sudden career shifts, rapid rise, or controversial visibility are possible if actions are driven by shortcuts. Rahu magnifies desire for status and power, testing ethical judgment in professional decisions. When aligned with discipline and integrity, this transit supports bold leadership and strategic breakthroughs rather than reputational volatility.

sections.heading: Career Direction & Ambition
points: Strong hunger for authority and recognition
Attraction to unconventional or high-impact roles
Rapid career movements or sudden shifts

sections.heading: Public Image & Reputation
points: Controversy may arise from bold actions

sections.heading: Leadership & Power Dynamics
points: Desire to dominate or control outcomes

sections.heading: Work Environment & Responsibility
points: Pressure to perform and deliver results
Burnout risk if balance is ignored

closing: Rahu in the 10th house accelerates career growth and visibility. Ethical clarity transforms ambition into lasting professional authority.
